welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tyngsborough, USA! Get ready to experience the charming New England atmosphere and enjoy our scenic beauty while exploring our town's rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Delta, and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, United Airlines, and Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Southwest, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and is also known as the John A. Volpe International Terminal.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
